name: Pure Bowl VR
description:
VR bowling, designed from the ground-up for VR with advanced physics to capture the feeling of real bowling.

Key features

  • Detailed lane oil simulation and configuration allow you set-up the game you want to play.
  • Advanced tracking options to work well with both inside-out tracking and base-stations.
  • Assists for beginners.
  • A range of AI opponents to bowl against.
  • Local hotseat games to play with friends.
  • Bowl-Lab and detailed statistics to help you improve your play.
